insert into five_ed_review_plan (business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, form_no, review_type, attend_user, attend_user_name, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, host_men, host_men_name, solution_overview, solution_guidance, solution_discussion) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attendUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hostMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hostMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solutionOverview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solutionGuidance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{solutionDiscussion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update five_ed_review_plan set business_key = #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_no = #{projectNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stage_name = #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_name = #{stepName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_no = #{formNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, review_type = #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attend_user = #{attendUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attend_user_name = #{attendUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator_name = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, process_instance_id = #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_process_end = #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, host_men = #{hostMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, host_men_name = #{hostMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution_overview = #{solutionOverview,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution_guidance = #{solutionGuidance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, solution_discussion = #{solutionDiscussion,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, form_no, review_type, attend_user, attend_user_name, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, host_men, host_men_name, solution_overview, solution_guidance, solution_discussion from five_ed_review_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, business_key, project_id, project_name, project_no, contract_no, stage_name, step_id, step_name, form_no, review_type, attend_user, attend_user_name, remark, is_deleted, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, process_instance_id, is_process_end, host_men, host_men_name, solution_overview, solution_guidance, solution_discussion from five_ed_review_plan
order by id desc
